Class InfoPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • Render.InfoPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class InfoPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Panel that display information about the game such as time left or chips left
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InfoPanel(MainFrame frame)
      Info panel needs: Level label + level number Time + time remaining Chips left Inventory (an array with 8 pos) so it'll be 8 labels that can have an image drawn over them
